Cookies.description: A chilly, layered cookies & cream landslide from the cookie to the frosting to the decorative mini cookie on top.
A luscious three-layer treat including a chilled graham cracker cookie, vanilla cream cheese frosting, and house-made raspberry jam.
Just like grandma makes—a vanilla sugar cookie topped with cinnamon roll filling.
The classic cookie filled with layers of creamy white drops and buttery macadamia nuts.
Rich Oreo-filled chocolate cookies topped with smooth vanilla cream cheese frosting and a sprinkle of Oreo crumbs.
A fluffy buttermilk cookie swirled with thick maple frosting, a sprinkle of real crispy bacon bits, and a drizzle of maple syrup.
A chilled sugar cookie with mini semi-sweet chips, a refreshing mint mousse, and a dollop of whipped cream.
A brown sugar cookie topped with cookie dough buttercream and chunks of delicious cookie dough pieces.
A warm lemony graham cookie with pops of blueberries and a tangy lemon drizzle.
A chocolate cookies & cream cookie topped with fresh strawberry cream cheese frosting and a drizzle of semi-sweet chocolate.

CRUMBL red velvet chocolate chip cookies are the perfect combination of a red velvet cookie and a chocolate chip cookie. They are thick, soft, chewy, and packed with white chocolate chips. With each bite from these red velvet white chip cookies, you’ll fall deeper and deeper back into your fondest childhood memories!
Just like grandma used to make
A new take on an old classic.
